div.bibl: Saloniki, Apr. 7, 1923. FOR THE RELIEF OF THE REFUGEES FROM ASIA MINOR

body.p: p. 2- We publish the photograph of a check sent in care of Saloniki, to the Greek Relief Committee, by the well-known commercial house of L. Klein, Fourteenth and Halsted Streets. This contribution is a token of the store's appreciation of its Greek customers.

We also publish the photograph of another check for one hundred dollars, a contribution likewise sent in care of Saloniki, by Mike Hechinger, an American, the son of the late C. E. Hechinger, well-known in the Greek commercial center.
